title: Still looking for a T206 Killian pitching with a Hindu back
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Still looking for a T206 Killian pitching with a Hindu back
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ed McCollum
If anyone knows of one currently available, or sees one at auction or for sale in the future, please let me know. This card would have to be available for purchase, not trade. Thanks. edmccollum@cox.net
